type ListControlDesigner = class inherit ControlDesigner interface IDataSourceProvider
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 用作设计器的基类，这些设计器在可视 Web 设计器中为 抽象类派生的控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视 Web 设计器中，当用户从 "源" 切换到设计视图时，将分析描述从类派生的控件的标记源代码， 并在设计图面上创建该控件的设计时版本。In the Visual Web Designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当用户切换回源视图时，设计时控件将保存到标记源代码，并将其编辑到网页的标记中。When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类用作设计器的基类，这些设计器在可视 Web 设计器中为派生自的控件提供设计时支持 。The class serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the . 类属性提供了以下功能：The class properties provide the following functionality: - 属性返回一个 对象，该对象通常包含一个对象，该对象是从 设计器的继承树中的每个级别的对象派生的。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the object for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 和 属性提供对派生自类的控件的相应属性的访问 。The and properties provide access to the corresponding properties of a control that is derived from the class. 和 指示用于分别提供列表项的文本和值内容的数据源字段。The and indicate the fields of the data source that provide the text and value content of the list items, respectively. 类方法提供了以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法将派生自的关联控件绑定 到设计时数据源。The method binds the associated control that is derived from the to a design-time data source. - 方法返回用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. - 方法 从关联的控件容器返回设计时组件。The method returns the design-time component from the associated control container. - 方法 从控件容器返回，解析为控件的设计时 属性。The method returns the from the control container, resolved to the design-time property of the control. - 方法准备设计器，以查看和设计派生自的关联控件 。The method prepares the designer to view and design the associated control that is derived from the . - 当关联控件的发生更改时，将调用方法 。The method is called when the for the associated control has changed. - 方法用于移除中的其他属性、向派生自的关联控件添加附加属性或隐藏属性 。The method is used to remove additional properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the . ## Examples 本部分提供了两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何派生自定义控件设计器。The first demonstrates how to derive a custom control designer. 第二个示例演示如何将派生控件与设计器关联。The second demonstrates how to associate a derived control with a designer. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个 `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` 从类继承的名为的类 。The following code example shows how to create a class named `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` that inherits from the class. `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`类将重写 、 和 方法。The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class overrides the , , and methods. `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`类 `SimpleRadioButtonList` 在设计图面上显示一个控件。The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class displays a `SimpleRadioButtonList` control on the design surface. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例 `SimpleRadioButtonList` 从控件派生控件 ，并演示如何使用 类将 `SimpleRadioButtonList` 控件与其设计器（类）关联 `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` 。The following code example derives the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control from the control, and shows how to use the class to associate the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control with its designer, the `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonList.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlist.vb#5)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在设计图面上创建派生自类的关联控件时，.NET Framework 在内部构造类的新实例 。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class on the design surface.

summary.span: 将指定的控件绑定到设计时数据源。

span.span: Binds the specified control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 基类， 方法将设置 对象的和 属性 以引用设计时数据源，然后调用 方法，然后将 和属性还原 为其原始值。For the base class, the method sets the and properties of the object to reference the design-time data source, then calls the method, and then restores the and properties to their original values. 但对于 类， 方法没有功能，因为 对象刚添加到 集合中。For the class, however, the method has no functionality, because objects were just added to the collection.

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的数据文本字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the data text field of the control.
The of the list control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置或检索运行时用于控件的设计时表示形式的标记。The property sets or retrieves the markup to use for the design-time representation of the control at run time. 这会通过设计器将访问权限提供给 关联控件的属性，该属性对应于提供列表项文本内容的数据源字段。This provides access via the designer to the property of the associated control, which corresponds to the field of the data source that provides the text content of the list items.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataValueField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataValueField : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的数据值字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the data value field of the control.
The of the list control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通过设计器将访问权限提供给 关联控件的属性，该属性指示提供列表项的值内容的数据源字段。The property provides access via the designer to the property of the associated control, which indicates the field of the data source that provides the value content of the list items.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML。

span.span: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 派生的控件的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the control derived from the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果从对象派生的关联控件 是数据绑定的，则 方法会清除 集合并添加一 条消息，指示控件是数据绑定的。If the associated control derived from the object is data-bound, the method clears the collection and adds a message indicating the control is data-bound. 如果关联的控件不是数据绑定的，且 集合为空，则 将添加一 条消息，指示控件未绑定。If the associated control is not data-bound and the collection is empty, the adds a message indicating the control is unbound. 然后， 调用其基方法来生成标记。Then, the calls its base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重写 方法，以自定义为设计图面上的关联控件显示的标记。The following code example overrides the method to customize the markup that is displayed for the associated control on a design surface. 如果 未为关联的控件定义该属性，则该属性将设置为 `Gainsboro` ，并且该控件将以该背景色显示。If the property is not defined for the associated control, it is set to `Gainsboro`, and the control is displayed with that background color. 完成此操作后，将调用方法的基实现 。After this is done, the base implementation of the method is called. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#2)]

span.span: A control derived from the that implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设计器宿主 准备好使用设计器呈现从类派生的控件时，将调用方法 。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the class. 方法及其基方法会配置属性并连接到设计器操作所需的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数是派生自的控件， 它与此设计器关联或是该控件的副本。The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the , that is associated with this designer or is a copy of that control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重写 从类派生的设计器中的方法 ，以确保 `SimpleRadioButtonList` 自定义设计器仅使用名为的控件类的实例。The following code example overrides the method in a designer derived from the class to ensure that only instances of a control class named `SimpleRadioButtonList` are used by the custom designer. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnComponentChanged (object source, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnComponentChanged(object source, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub OnComponentChanged (source As Object, ce As ComponentChangedEventArgs)
public: override void OnComponentChanged(System::Object ^ source, System::ComponentModel::Design::ComponentChangedEventArgs ^ ce);

span.span: The source of the event.
The event data.
Raises the ComponentChanged event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理对组件所做的更改。Handles changes made to the component. 这包括在属性网格中所做的更改。This includes changes made in the property grid.

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnDataSourceChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnDataSourceChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基方法将派生自对象的关联控件连接 到当前数据源，如果与控件连接到的数据源不同，则更新设计时标记。The base method connects the associated control that is derived from the object to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup. 方法在连接到当前数据源后更新设计时标记。The method updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重写 从类继承的类中的方法 。The following code example overrides the method in a class that inherits from the class. 当与设计器类关联的数据源发生更改时，将 调用方法，并且此代码将设置一个名 `changedDataSource` 为的变量 `true` 。When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the method is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#4)]

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基方法将派生自类的关联控件连接 到当前数据源，如果与控件连接到的数据源不同，则更新设计时标记。The base method connects the associated control that is derived from the class to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup. 在 连接到当前数据源后，设计器的方法会无条件更新设计时标记。The method of the designer unconditionally updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source. 的值 `forceUpdateView` 被忽略。The value of `forceUpdateView` is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重写 从类继承的类中的方法 。The following code example overrides the method in a class that inherits from the class. 当与设计器类关联的数据源发生更改时，将 调用，此代码会将一个名为的变量设置 `changedDataSource` 为 `true` 。When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 调用方应使用公共 重写。

span.span: Callers should use the public override.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现已添加或隐藏属性 的集合，在设计时为关联控件公开。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added or shadowed properties to expose for the associated control at design time.

summary.span: 供设计器用于在“属性”网格的显示中删除或添加属性，或者隐藏关联控件的属性\*\*\*\*。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove additional properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用从方法派生的方法， 用设计器实现的相应设计时属性隐藏各种控件属性，以及在 " **属性** " 网格中添加或删除属性。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 对于从对象派生的控件 ，将 属性添加到 关联控件的和 属性。For controls that are derived from the object, the adds the attribute to the and properties of the associated control.

para.span: 重写 方法，以便在设计时属性集合中将属性添加到属性或更改属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UseDataSourcePickerActionList As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UseDataSourcePickerActionList { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示关联控件是否应呈现其默认操作列表。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated control should render its default action lists.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将返回， `false` 以便不会使用 "**常用任务**" 上下文菜单中的 "**选择数据源**" 菜单项显示数据源下拉列表。The property returns `false` so that a data source dropdown is not displayed with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu. 相反，此菜单项将显示 " **选择数据源** " 对话框，该对话框允许用户选择 和 和 属性。Instead, this menu item displays the **Choose Data Source** dialog box, which allows the user to select a and the and properties.

para.span: 如果希望从类派生的控件在 设计时使用 "**常用任务**" 上下文菜单中的 "**选择数据源**" 菜单项显示数据源下拉列表项，请重写属性以返回。

span.span: Override the property to return if you want the control that is derived from the class to display a data source dropdown with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu at design time.
